people.name: Marcus Aurelius
people.quote: Nowhere you can go is more peaceful, more free of interruptions, than your own soul. Retreat to consult your own soul and then return to face what awaits you.
people.subject: Negativity

people.name: Marcus Aurelius
people.quote: Is a world without pain possible? Then don't ask the impossible.
people.subject: Negativity

people.name: Marcus Aurelius
people.quote: Nowhere you can go is more peaceful, more free of interruptions, than your own soul. Retreat to consult your own soul and then return to face what awaits you.
people.subject: Negativity

people.name: Marcus Aurelius
people.quote: Is a world without pain possible? Then don't ask the impossible.
people.subject: Others

people.name: Marcus Aurelius
people.quote: Ask: What is so unbearable about this situation? Why can't you endure it? You will be embarrassed to answer.
people.subject: Others

people.name: Marcus Aurelius
people.quote: To do harm is to do yourself harm. To do an injustice is to do yourself an injustice. It degrades you. You can also commit injustice by doing nothing.
people.subject: Others

people.name: Marcus Aurelius
people.quote: It's silly to try to escape other people's faults. Just try and escape your own.
people.subject: Others

people.name: Marcus Aurelius
people.quote: People exist for one another. You can instruct or endure them.
people.subject: Others

people.name: Marcus Aurelius
people.quote: There have to be shameless people in the world. This person in front of you might just be one of them. Remembering that a whole class must necessarily exist will enable you to tolerate its members.
people.subject: Others

people.name: Marcus Aurelius
people.quote: As an antidote to battle unkindness we were given kindness.
people.subject: Others

people.name: Marcus Aurelius
people.quote: Choose not to be harmed and you won't feel harmed. Don't feel harmed, and you haven't been.
people.subject: Others

people.name: Marcus Aurelius
people.quote: When you wake up in the morning, tell yourself: The people I deal with today will be meddling, ungrateful, arrogant, dishonest, jealous, and surly. They are like this because they can't tell good from evil. But I have seen the beauty of good and the ugliness of evil, and have recognized that the wrongdoer has a nature related to my own â€“ not of the same blood or birth, but the same mind, and possessing a share of the divine. And so none of them can hurt me. No one can implicate me in ugliness. Nor can I feel angry at my relative, or hate him. We were born to work together like feet, hands, and eyes, like the two rows of teeth, upper and lower. To obstruct each other is unnatural. To feel anger at someone, to turn your back on him: these are obstructions.
people.subject: Others

people.name: Marcus Aurelius
people.quote: The only thing that isn't worthless: to live this life out truthfully and rightly. And be patient with those who don't.
people.subject: Others

people.name: Marcus Aurelius
people.quote: After death there is no 'us' to suffer harm.
people.subject: Dying

people.name: Marcus Aurelius
people.quote: Nature first invited you in and then sends you away. Before long, darkness. Make your exit with grace. The same grace shown to you.
people.subject: Dying

people.name: Marcus Aurelius
people.quote: Accept death in a cheerful spirit, as nothing but the dissolution of the elements from which each living thing is composed. If it doesn't hurt the individual elements to change continually into one another, why are people afraid of all of them changing and separating? It's a natural thing. And nothing natural is evil.
people.subject: Dying

people.name: Marcus Aurelius
people.quote: You could leave life right now. Let that determine what you do, say, and think.
people.subject: Dying

people.name: Marcus Aurelius
people.quote: Your soul takes on the color of your thoughts.
people.subject: Advice

people.name: Marcus Aurelius
people.quote: If it's endurable, then endure it. If it's not endurable, then stop complaining. Your destruct will mean its end as well.
people.subject: Advice

people.name: Marcus Aurelius
people.quote: Do everything as if it were the last thing you were doing in your life.
people.subject: Advice

people.name: Marcus Aurelius
people.quote: At some point you have to recognize what world it is that you belong to; what power rules it and from what source you spring; that there is a limit to the time assigned you, and if you don't use it to free yourself it will be gone and will never return.
people.subject: Advice

people.name: Marcus Aurelius
people.quote: Keep before your eyes all those that experienced it before you, and felt shock and outrage and resentment at it. Where are they now? Nowhere.
people.subject: Failing

people.name: Marcus Aurelius
people.quote: People who are excited by posthumous fame forget that those who remember them will soon die too.
people.subject: Failing

people.name: Marcus Aurelius
people.quote: Is it your reputation that is bothering you? But look at how soon we're all forgotten. The abyss of endless time that swallows all. The emptiness of all those applauding hands.
people.subject: Failing

people.name: Buddha
people.quote: The mind is everything. What you think you become.
people.subject: Mind

people.name: Buddha
people.quote: Peace comes from within. Do not seek it without.
people.subject: Peace

people.name: Buddha
people.quote: Thousands of candles can be lighted from a single candle, and the life of the candle will not be shortened. Happiness never decreases by being shared.
people.subject: Life

people.name: Buddha
people.quote: Holding on to anger is like grasping a hot coal with the intent of throwing it at someone else; you are the one who gets burned.
people.subject: Us

people.name: Buddha
people.quote: Better than a thousand hollow words, is one word that brings peace.
people.subject: Peace

people.name: Buddha
people.quote: Better than worshiping gods is obedience to the laws of righteousness.
people.subject: Gods

people.name: Buddha
people.quote: Hatred does not cease by hatred, but only by love; this is the eternal rule.
people.subject: Love

people.name: Albert Einstein
people.quote: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.
people.subject: Life

people.name: Albert Einstein
people.quote: The true sign of intelligence is not knowledge but imagination.
people.subject: Knowledge

people.name: Albert Einstein
people.quote: Try not to become a man of success, but rather try to become a man of value.
people.subject: Success

people.name: Albert Einstein
people.quote: Education is what remains after one has forgotten what one has learned in school.
people.subject: Education

people.name: Albert Einstein
people.quote: We cannot solve our problems with the same thinking we used when we created them.
people.subject: Mind

people.name: Albert Einstein
people.quote: The difference between stupidity and genius is that genius has its limits.
people.subject: Intelligence

people.name: Albert Einstein
people.quote: Joy in looking and comprehending is nature's most beautiful gift.
people.subject: Nature

people.name: Albert Einstein
people.quote: Whoever is careless with the truth in small matters cannot be trusted with important matters.
people.subject: Truth

people.name: Albert Einstein
people.quote: Peace cannot be kept by force; it can only be achieved by understanding.
people.subject: Peace

people.name: Albert Einstein
people.quote: It is the supreme art of the teacher to awaken joy in creative expression and knowledge.
people.subject: Knowledge

people.name: Albert Einstein
people.quote: The only source of knowledge is experience.
people.subject: Knowledge

people.name: Albert Einstein
people.quote: Logic will get you from A to B. Imagination will take you everywhere.
people.subject: Logic

people.name: Albert Einstein
people.quote: Only two things are infinite, the universe and human stupidity, and I'm not sure about the former.
people.subject: Stupidity

people.name: Albert Einstein
people.quote: Learn from yesterday, live for today, hope for tomorrow. The important thing is not to stop questioning.
people.subject: Hope

people.name: Albert Einstein
people.quote: I have no special talent. I am only passionately curious.
people.subject: Talent

people.name: Albert Einstein
people.quote: A person who never made a mistake never tried anything new.
people.subject: Mistake

people.name: Albert Einstein
people.quote: Weakness of attitude becomes weakness of character.
people.subject: Attitude

people.name: Albert Einstein
people.quote: It has become appallingly obvious that our technology has exceeded our humanity.
people.subject: Technology

people.name: Albert Einstein
people.quote: You can't blame gravity for falling in love.
people.subject: Love

people.name: Albert Einstein
people.quote: Pure mathematics is, in its way, the poetry of logical ideas.
people.subject: Mathematics

people.name: Albert Einstein
people.quote: Science without religion is lame, religion without science is blind.
people.subject: Science

people.name: Albert Einstein
people.quote: Once we accept our limits, we go beyond them.
people.subject: Limits

people.name: Albert Einstein
people.quote: The important thing is not to stop questioning. Curiosity has its own reason for existing.
people.subject: Curiosity

people.name: Albert Einstein
people.quote: It's not that I'm so smart, it's just that I stay with problems longer.
people.subject: Intelligence

people.name: Albert Einstein
people.quote: The world is a dangerous place to live; not because of the people who are evil, but because of the people who don't do anything about it.
people.subject: World

people.name: Albert Einstein
people.quote: If you can't explain it simply, you don't understand it well enough.
people.subject: Understanding

people.name: Albert Einstein
people.quote: Without deep reflection one knows from daily life that one exists for other people.
people.subject: Life

people.name: Albert Einstein
people.quote: Intellectual growth should commence at birth and cease only at death.
people.subject: Growth

people.name: Albert Einstein
people.quote: Any man who reads too much and uses his own brain too little falls into lazy habits of thinking.
people.subject: Thinking

people.name: Albert Einstein
people.quote: The monotony and solitude of a quiet life stimulates the creative mind.
people.subject: Life

people.name: Albert Einstein
people.quote: Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value.
people.subject: Success

people.name: Albert Einstein
people.quote: The distinction between the past, present and future is only a stubbornly persistent illusion.
people.subject: Illusion

people.name: Albert Einstein
people.quote: Nationalism is an infantile disease. It is the measles of mankind.
people.subject: Nationalism

people.name: Albert Einstein
people.quote: Put your hand on a hot stove for a minute and it seems like an hour. Sit with a pretty girl for an hour, and it seems like a minute.
people.subject: Love

people.name: Albert Einstein
people.quote: Few are those who see with their own eyes and feel with their own hearts.
people.subject: See

people.name: Albert Einstein
people.quote: Our task must be to free ourselves by widening our circle of compassion to embrace all living creatures and the whole of nature and its beauty.
people.subject: Nature

people.name: Albert Einstein
people.quote: The hardest thing to understand in the world is the income tax.
people.subject: Money

people.name: Albert Einstein
people.quote: There are two ways to live: you can live as if nothing is a miracle; you can live as if everything is a miracle.
people.subject: Life

people.name: Albert Einstein
people.quote: Everyone should be respected as an individual, but no one idolized.
people.subject: Respect

people.name: Albert Einstein
people.quote: Great spirits have always encountered violent opposition from mediocre minds.
people.subject: Great

people.name: Albert Einstein
people.quote: Intellectuals solve problems, geniuses prevent them.
people.subject: Wisdom

people.name: Albert Einstein
people.quote: Coincidence is God's way of remaining anonymous.
people.subject: Religion

people.name: Albert Einstein
people.quote: The value of a man should be seen in what he gives and not in what he is able to receive.
people.subject: Value

people.name: Albert Einstein
people.quote: I know not with what weapons World War III will be fought, but World War IV will be fought with sticks and stones.
people.subject: War

people.name: Albert Einstein
people.quote: Most people say that it is the intellect which makes a great scientist. They are wrong: it is character.
people.subject: Character

people.name: Albert Einstein
people.quote: As far as I'm concerned, I prefer silent vice to ostentatious virtue.
people.subject: Virtue

people.name: Albert Einstein
people.quote: Technological progress is like an axe in the hands of a pathological criminal.
people.subject: Progress

people.name: Albert Einstein
people.quote: Before God we are all equally wise - and equally foolish.
people.subject: Religion

people.name: Albert Einstein
people.quote: The only real valuable thing is intuition.
people.subject: Intuition

people.name: Albert Einstein
people.quote: Solitude is painful when one is young, but delightful when one is more mature.
people.subject: Solitude

people.name: Albert Einstein
people.quote: I am a deeply religious nonbeliever - this is a somewhat new kind of religion.
people.subject: Religion

people.name: Albert Einstein
people.quote: Only a life lived for others is a life worthwhile.
people.subject: Life

people.name: Albert Einstein
people.quote: Love is a better teacher than duty.
people.subject: Love

people.name: Albert Einstein
people.quote: When the solution is simple, God is answering.
people.subject: Religion

people.name: Albert Einstein
people.quote: The faster you go, the shorter you are.
people.subject: Fast

people.name: Albert Einstein
people.quote: An empty stomach is not a good political adviser.
people.subject: Politics

people.name: Albert Einstein
people.quote: Only one who devotes himself to a cause with his whole strength and soul can be a true master. For this reason mastery demands all of a person.
people.subject: Strength
